CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...7. The Colgate-Palmolive Company booth was manned by John J. O'Connel and William P. Hussey...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: John J. O'Connel and William P. Hussey standing in Colgate - Palmolive Company booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
